User.title: User
User.description: Represents a user of the Aura application.

arePlaylistsPublic.description: Determines if the user's playlists are visible to others.

songCount.description: The number of songs in the playlist.

Song.title: Song
Song.description: Represents a song in the user's music library.

Message.title: Message
Message.description: Represents a single chat message for a specific song.

Follow.title: Follow
Follow.description: Represents a follow relationship between two users.

uid.description: The UID of the user who is following or being followed.

Chat.title: Chat
Chat.description: Represents a private chat session between users. IMPORTANT: This collection should only be queryable with a 'where' clause on 'participantIds' using 'array-contains'. Listing the entire collection is a security risk and should be disallowed.

participantIds.description: An array containing the UIDs of all participants in the chat.

/users/{userId}.description: Stores user profile information. Each user has a document identified by their unique user ID. Reading should be allowed by any authenticated user, but writing should be restricted to the owner.

/users/{userId}/playlists/{playlistId}.description: Stores the metadata for user-created playlists. Reading should be allowed by any authenticated user, but writing should be restricted to the owner.

/users/{userId}/playlists/{playlistId}/s.description: Sub-collection storing the songs for a specific playlist. Reading and writing should be restricted to the owner.

/songs/{songId}.description: Stores all songs added by any user, forming a global catalog. All authenticated users should be able to read and write.

/songs/{songId}/messages/{messageId}.description: Sub-collection storing the chat messages for a specific song. All authenticated users should be able to read and write.

/users/{userId}/followers/{followerId}.description: A list of users who are following the user specified by {userId}. Reading should be allowed by any authenticated user. Writing is complex (see rules).

/users/{userId}/following/{followingId}.description: A list of users that the user specified by {userId} is following. Reading should be allowed by any authenticated user, but only the owner can write.

/chats/{chatId}.description: Represents a private chat room between two or more users. Reading a single document and all writes should be restricted to participants. Listing the collection should only be allowed with a query filtering by the current user's ID in 'participantIds'.

/chats/{chatId}/messages/{messageId}.description: Stores the messages for a specific private chat room. All operations should be restricted to participants of the parent chat.
